On a mirrored rootvg system

  1. Find out the rootvg
    lspv | grep rootvg
hdisky          00021ffb513afe5a                    rootvg          active
hdiskx          00021ffb513aff90                    rootvg          active
  2. Unmirror the VG
    sudo unmirrorvg rootvg hdiskX
  3. Remove the disk from rootvg
    sudo reducevg rootvg hdiskX
  4. Clear the VGDA
    sudo chpv -c hdiskX
  5. Set the bootlist to boot from the remaining disk
    sudo bootlist -m normal hdiskY
  6. Perform an alt_disk_copy to the alt_rootvg
    sudo alt_disk_copy -B -d hdiskX
  7. Check altinsta_rootvg has been created
    lspv | grep rootvg

    Make sure you see the altinst_rootvg in the output
